actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Treasury to study and report to the Congress on the unitary method of taxation.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Treasury to analyze the unitary method of taxation, as applied to worldwide income and report the findings and recommendations to the House Ways and Means Committee and the Senate Finance Committee.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Treasury to study and report to the Congress on the unitary method of taxation.
